title: Demotion Shield?
body:
Ive been losing a lot in ranked lately, so much so that i went from being at 70 LP in Gold 4 to all the way back down to 0 LP in Gold 5. Ive been really stressed out about playing ranked because im scared that if i lose one or two more i will demote back down to Silver 1. 
I recently looked at my profile and i saw a yellow warning sign above my rank saying this: https://i.gyazo.com/b061557ad8c5a9b728243a7c17cabfdf.png

As far as i know, the shield is only there when you promote to a new division or tier. How come it is there for me at this moment? I havent been promoted lately, just demoted. Its also really confusing because it says im being shielded from demotion, but i have also lost enough games to maintain my rank. What does this mean? Do i actually have the shield, and if so, how long do i have on it?

Thanks.

replies.body:
I’m at gold V with 0 lp and the warning.... Will I get demoted if I don’t play till
New season? Or am I safe if I just stay away from ranked till season is over.  I know they is no lp decay in gold but could the warning demote you if you don’t play????
I want to know too... I'm at 33lp in gold v currently and I have the message. can I drop even though I'm not at 0lp?

If you hit Division 5, 0 LP of silver or above, The game won't drop you down until your MMR has dropped significantly below the threshold for your current tier.

For example, as was my case at the start of the season, my MMR was around that of Bronze 3 when the system finally booted me from silver after a horrible losing streak.

According to OP.GG, my MMR is Silver 3(1,358), with my rank being Gold 5. I play a lot of duo games with my friends, so it might be inaccurate, but if that is the case, i dont know if my MMR is higher or lower than it says. 

I havent played any games after hitting 0LP in Gold 5, but with my MMR being that low, would that mean that i have a lot fewer games i get to lose at 0LP before i get demoted?

Correct me if i'm wrong, but i think it was like this.
Normaly you would have demoted, but because you are at gold 5 you need to reach silver 5 MMR before you will really demote.
Thats why its says you have that shield.
If you kept losing at 0 LP, you would eventually get demoted.

Hello everyone!

I came here because I am experiencing the same thing but here is some input:

I agree with what someone else had said on this thread: The official posting of when the ranked system was reworked was around 2014 I think. Someone said the system works like this: If you are gold 5, you will not demote to Silver 1 unless your MMR reaches a point an entire tier below your current rank. (aka if you're d5, you have to drop down to g5 mmr to be demoted to d1.)

Another thing to consider: I was demoted last season from s2 to s3, I got into s2, lost 4 games (dropping my MMR) but then I won a game. However, I lost my next game which demoted me back down to s3. From this, I assume the shield was given, but expired once I won a match.

Not too confident in this, but hope it helps!

Straaaaaange. I'm looking over your ranked history now and your right about your rank and LP, so it's actually really weird that you're seeing a Demotion Shield. You're only supposed to get those after recently being promoted to a new division or tier to prevent you from feeling the pain of immediately dropping back down. I'm honestly not sure why your client is showing that shield, but let me know if it never goes away.
Could it be a glitch? I dont want to rely on the shield and have a false hope that im not going to demote if i keep losing at 0LP, or should i just not rely on it?
Honestly? I would probably ignore it. It's not intended for you to get a demotion shield when dropping a rank, so there's a chance it's some type of visual bug.

So, does this mean we will not drop down to silver from Gold?
I have this thing too after a horrid losing streak. Currently having 45 LP, still got the warning.

If I understood you correctly, this is nothing we should worry about and that we cannot drop down to silver?
i have it too :( ik im late with this boards post but im scared aswell lol

Greetings, I am also worried. I am currently Diamond 5 with 0 lp. I want to get diamond rewards but I have the red shield. I am just wondering if it will effect how fast I will degrade down if I don't play.

Hey, so.. I "recently" hit Gold 5 and I've won and lost won and lost and I'm at 0LP but have the warning.. Is it possible for me to get demoted even tho I'm not playing any games? Like if I don't play more ranked games I'll 100% stay gold right? The system can't demote me on past losses correct? Or when the season ends I'll get put in silver to troll me?
Just FYI I noticed it too the other day when I was losing a lot of games at S5
FYI - that message will stay there, and will not go away. You can get demoted even though that message is there. But it takes significant losses at 0 LP. Significant like 10-15 in a row.
